data.lore: Kalista is an eternal spirit of retribution, who possesses a cold-burning hatred for all betrayers, deceivers, and traitors. In life, she was a legendary warrior, but while trying to avert tragedy she was betrayed and slain by those she trusted most. Now, she is an undying entity that can be invoked to exact vengeance, but only at great cost: the supplicant’s soul becomes forfeit, bound to her for eternity.
data.name: Kalista
data.title: the Spear of Vengeance

spells.tooltip:
A fast but narrow projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E).

If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.
spells.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: A fast but narrow projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E). If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.
spells.name: Pierce
spells.sanitizedDescription: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

spells.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista and her Oathsworn both basic attack the same target within 1.5 seconds, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage (minimum {{ e6 }}-{{ e3 }} damage to minions, based on missing health). 8 second cooldown per target.

Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions they see are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 7 laps.

Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.description:
Passively deal bonus damage when striking the same target as the Oathsworn ally.

Activate to send a soul to patrol a path, revealing the area in front of it.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: When Kalista and her Oathsworn both basic attack the same target within 1.5 seconds, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage (minimum {{ e6 }}-{{ e3 }} damage to minions, based on missing health). 8 second cooldown per target. Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions they see are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 7 laps. Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.name: Sentinel
spells.sanitizedDescription: Passively deal bonus damage when striking the same target as the Oathsworn ally. Activate to send a soul to patrol a path, revealing the area in front of it.

effect: {{ e9 }} <font color='#FF8C00'>(+{{ f1 }})</font> -> {{ e9NL }} <font color='#FF8C00'>(+{{ f3 }})</font>
label: Damage
Bonus Damage per Spear
Slow
Cooldown

spells.tooltip:
While off cooldown, Kalista's spears pierce their target and linger there for 4 seconds.

Active: Kalista rips the spears from nearby targets, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. Each extra spear increases Rend's damage by {{ e9 }} (+{{ f1 }}).

If it kills a target, Rend's cooldown is reset and Kalista regains {{ e8 }} mana (up to twice per cast).
spells.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: While off cooldown, Kalista's spears pierce their target and linger there for 4 seconds. Active: Kalista rips the spears from nearby targets, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. Each extra spear increases Rend's damage by {{ e9 }} (+{{ f1 }}). If it kills a target, Rend's cooldown is reset and Kalista regains {{ e8 }} mana (up to twice per cast).
spells.name: Rend
spells.sanitizedDescription: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

spells.tooltip:
Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable but pacified.

They may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, knocking all enemies in a small radius back and placing the Oathsworn at their maximum attack range from the enemy.

Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1400 units for her to cast this ability.
spells.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable but pacified. They may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, knocking all enemies in a small radius back and placing the Oathsworn at their maximum attack range from the enemy. Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1400 units for her to cast this ability.
spells.name: Fate's Call
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

passive.name: Martial Poise
passive.description: If Kalista enters a movement command while winding up her basic attack or Pierce, she will drive through in that direction when she launches her attack, lunging toward that point.
passive.sanitizedDescription: If Kalista enters a movement command while winding up her basic attack or Pierce, she will drive through in that direction when she launches her attack, lunging toward that point.
